game_description: In this game, we can simulate the environment of bowling, bowling training, improve their bowling skills.Move the cursor to the bowling ball, highlight it and click the button to retrieve the bowling ball. Hold the button down, wave your arms, release the button and throw the bowling ball. A bowling ball scores points by flying forward to knock down the pins.
